text: As of 2013, two sites in North Korea have been added to the World Heritage List. Both are cultural sites. There are also five sites on the tentative list. ==World Heritage Sites== Site Image Location Criteria Area ha (acre) Year Description Refs Complex of Koguryo tombs Pyongyang and nearby i, ii, iii, iv 2004 1091 Historic Monuments and Sites in Kaesong Kaesong ii, iii 494.2 ha 2013 1278 ==References== ==Other websites== * UNESCO World Heritage Sites - Democratic People's Republic of Korea * Korea, North Category:North Korea-related lists
title: List of World Heritage Sites in North Korea
